meanings.definition: Tardyons: Particles that move slower than the speed of light.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study tardyons to understand their slow movement.
meanings.sent2: The tardyons in the experiment traveled at a leisurely pace.
meanings.sent3: The tardyons decided to take a relaxing stroll instead of rushing.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts moved as tardyons, gradually forming into ideas.
meanings.sent5: The tardyons crept along the path, like slow-motion dancers.

meanings.sent1: The tardyons' mass makes them significant in particle physics.
meanings.sent2: Scientists discovered new tardyons with varying masses.
meanings.sent3: The tardyons threw a mass party to celebrate their existence.
meanings.sent4: His ideas carried the weight of tardyons, influencing others.
meanings.sent5: The tardyons' mass anchored them to the core of the experiment.
